venue.address_1: Sand Hill Rd & Chief Ryan Way
venue.name: Pavilion at Nevers Park

item.description:
Saturday, May 22nd Paws in the Park 10 a.m. Nevers Park
Be a part of one of the largest events of the year for us and the Town of South Windsor. The event draws over 700 people and raises more than $2,500 for Fidelco Guide Dog Foundation and South Windsor Bark Park. Free admission and dogs encouraged to attend. There will be vendors, food, demonstrations, attractions (including a free moon bounce), tea cup auction and more.

Volunteers needed from 8 a.m. until 4 p.m. Volunteer jobs include: helping at drink station, kid's crafts table, tea cup auction, greeters with goodie bags and dog contest helpers. Great event to help out, hang out and check out tons of four-legged friends.

Please list your availability. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for volunteers with Jaycees shirts!
item.name: Paws in the Park Event Day
